file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-31-03-04 - ATTENDANT HANDSETS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ATTENDANT HANDSETS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the attendant handset/cradle. B. The attendant handset/cradle is installed on the cockpit partition and, optionally, there is other attendant handset installed outside the LH forward partition of the toilet compartment. C. The two attendant handset/cradle are similar and the procedures in this section apply to the two attendant handset/cradle. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AT- ATTENDANT HANDSET/CRADLE - RE- TENDANT HANDSET 23-31-03-000-801-A MOVAL INSTALLED AIRCRAFT WITH AT- ATTENDANT HANDSET/CRADLE - IN- TENDANT HANDSET 23-31-03-400-801-A STALLATION INSTALLED EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-31-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ATTENDANT HANDSET INSTALLED 2. ATTENDANT HANDSET/CRADLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the attendant handset. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 231 Cockpit partition, LH 261 Toilet forward partition, LH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the cockpit ceiling, on the circuit breaker panel, open the PA circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). I. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Pull the attendant handset (2) off from the cradle (5). (2) Remove the screws (1). (3) Pull the cradle (5) and remove the screws (4) that attach the connector (3) to it. (4) Remove the cradle (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ATTENDANT HANDSET INSTALLED Cockpit Partition LH - Attendant Handset/Cradle - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 231 B PARTITION ( REF.) 5. CRADLE DET. A 1. SCREW (3) 2. ATTENDANT 4. SCREW (2) HANDSET 3. CONNECTOR DET. B EM145AMM230129F.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH THE OPTIONAL ATTENDANT HANDSET Toilet Forward Partition LH - Attendant Handset/Cradle - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONE 261 B 5. CRADLE DET. A FWD 1. SCREW (3) PARTITION ((REF.) 2. ATTENDANT HANDSET 4. SCREW (2) 3. CONNECTOR DET. B EM145AMM230191D.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-31-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-31-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ATTENDANT HANDSET INSTALLED 3. ATTENDANT HANDSET/CRADLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the attendant handset. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION PASSENGER ADDRESS & CABIN INTERPHONE AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-801-A/500 SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST CABIN INTERPHONE EMER/BACKUP MODE - OP- AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-802-A/500 ERATIONAL CHECK PASSENGER CABIN LOUDSPEAKER - OPERATION- AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-803-A/500 AL CHECK PASSENGER-ADDRESS AUDIO VOLUME AND SEN- AMM TASK 23-31-00-820-801-A/500 SITIVITY - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 231 Cockpit partition, LH 261 Toilet forward partition, LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the connector (3) in its installation position and install the screws (4) that attach the connector (3) to the cradle (5). (2) Put the cradle (5) in its installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-31-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the screws (1) that attach the cradle (5) to the partition. (4) Hang the attendant handset (2) up. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the cockpit ceiling, on the circuit breaker panel, close the PA circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/ PA). (2) Do the passenger address & cabin interphone system operational test ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-801-A/500). (3) Do the cabin interphone EMERG/BACKUP mode operational check ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-802-A/500). (4) Do the passenger cabin loudspeaker operational check ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-700-803-A/500). (5) Do the passenger-address audio volume and sensitivity adjustment ( AMM TASK 23-31-00-820-801-A/500).
